version_description:
Cryptohopper is back with a great update. We've listened to your feedback and we'd like to present the highlights:

- It's now possible to change the app language;
- Automatic refresh on open positions (to update profit/loss %);
- Support in-app registrations;
- Support in-app manual buy;
- Fix error with different profit/loss % on positions compared to our website;
- Option to disable authentication on app restart.

Cryptohopper is back with a great update. We've listened to your feedback and we'd like to present the highlights:

- It's now possible to change the app language;
- Automatic refresh on open positions (to update profit/loss %);
- Support in-app registrations;
- Support in-app manual buy;
- Fix error with different profit/loss % on positions compared to our website;
- Option to disable authentication on app restart.

Cryptohopper is back with a great update.
- It's now possible to change most of your hopper's configuration
- Fixed a bug with the positions profit/loss percentage

Cryptohopper is back with a great update.
- It's now possible to change most of your hopper's configuration
- Fixed a bug with the positions profit/loss percentage

- Night Theme Support (for all you late night traders)
- Awesome features in all languages (except for this message)
- Bugfixes

- Night Theme Support (for all you late night traders)
- Awesome features in all languages (except for this message)
- Bugfixes

- Cancel and remove options are now available on open orders
- Positions will now also display the buy rate
- Greatly decreased loading time on all position tabs
- Fixed issues where some options in the configuration settings would not correctly save

- Cancel and remove options are now available on open orders
- Positions will now also display the buy rate
- Greatly decreased loading time on all position tabs
- Fixed issues where some options in the configuration settings would not correctly save
Fixed an unfriendly bug that would lead to a crash on iPhone X and higher devices when switching to dark mode.
Fixed an unfriendly bug that would lead to a crash on iPhone X and higher devices when switching to dark mode.
